query: create or replace view `dfs`.`AAR  Views`.CLIENT_Compliance as SELECT qr.snapshot, qr.appname, qr.f['reference']['key'] AS metric_id , qr.f['reference']['name'] AS metric_name , qr.f['result']['violationRatio']['totalChecks'] AS checks , qr.f['result']['violationRatio']['failedChecks'] AS failed , qr.f['result']['violationRatio']['successfulChecks'] AS success  FROM (SELECT t.number AS snapshot, t.applicationSnapshot['name'] AS appname , FLATTEN(t.applicationResults) AS f  FROM `dfs`.`AAR  Inputs`.`./CLIENT-Compliance.json` AS t) AS qr
